form.name: form1

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The administrative team of the Maplewood Schools is working hard each day to keep up with the constant updates being made at the state and federal level. This document may change by the day, but we feel it is important to post so that our students and families know that your questions and concerns are also our questions and concerns. Please check back often.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.span: To participate in the food distribution program please contact 330-637-7506.
Please remember to fill out your census report as this data is used to provide vital programs to our students.

div.span: 2414 Greenville Road Cortland, Ohio 44410 PH 330-637-7506 Fax 330-637-6616

form.script: function Prev0(){if(currImg0>0){currImg0--;}else{currImg0=arr0.length-1;}image0.src = arr0[currImg0].File;caption0.innerHTML = arr0[currImg0].Caption;}function Next0(){if(currImg0<arr0.length-1){currImg0++;} else {currImg0=0;}image0.src = arr0[currImg0].File;caption0.innerHTML = arr0[currImg0].Caption;}function Photo0(file, caption){this.File = file;this.Caption = caption;}var currImg0 = 0;var image0 = document.getElementById('ContentPage1_ctl20_imgPhoto');var caption0 = document.getElementById('ContentPage1_ctl20_lblCaption');var arr0 = new Array();arr0[0] = new Photo0('https://www.maplewood.k12.oh.us/GalleryImages/2013830113332159_image.jpg', '');arr0[1] = new Photo0('https://www.maplewood.k12.oh.us/GalleryImages/2013830113332377_image.JPG', '');arr0[2] = new Photo0('https://www.maplewood.k12.oh.us/GalleryImages/2013830113332549_image.jpg', '');arr0[3] = new Photo0('https://www.maplewood.k12.oh.us/GalleryImages/2013830114611811_image.jpg', '');arr0[4] = new Photo0('https://www.maplewood.k12.oh.us/GalleryImages/2013830114611904_image.jpg', '');image0.src = arr0[0].File;caption0.innerHTML = arr0[0].Caption;
